properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manam thermaninchedamipude mananota vanchana lekunda Marugaina papamulanniti Hrudayamunundi tholaginchedam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maru manassu pondedamipude jeevithamosamulanundi Parisuddalamai nirdoshuluga prabhudinamandu kanapadedam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Apavadiki chotivvaka bahujagratthatho nundedamu Manushyulanu santhoshapettaka daiva chittamulo nilichedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nenu na inti varalamu yehovane sevinchedamu Neevevarini sevinchedavo ee diname theermaninchuko{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Padipoyina Nee balipeetamun saricheyutaku neevu siddama Israelu devuni vedina agni moolamuga badulitchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Intha varaku ninnu nadipina Ebinejaraina nee devuni Neevu marachi jeevinchinacho neeku nemmadiye undadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dvandva jeevitha margamulu yeruguduva asthiramulani Poornamanassutho prabhunvedakina poorna mahimatho nindedavu{/lang-eng}
